H0.text: In which year did South Korea hold its first 'Grand Prix' motor race. 2008

H1.text: In which year did South Korea hold its first 'Grand Prix' motor race. 2005

H2.text: In which year did South Korea hold its first 'Grand Prix' motor race. 2012

H3.text: In which year did South Korea hold its first 'Grand Prix' motor race. 2010

A4.text: The Korean Grand Prix was held in South Korea from 2010 until 2013.

A5.text: On 2 October 2006, it was confirmed that the event would take place in 2010.
